title: Chat Agent Web Components
text:
between ​may ​- ​august ​of ​2024 i ​created ​numerous ​web ​components ​for ​haxtheweb ​(now ​haxlabs). these ​were ​utilized ​to ​create ​one ​big ​component, ​named ​chat-agent. ​the goal ​this ​project ​was ​a ​chat ​agent ​websites ​with ​haxcms that ​could essentially act ​as a ​virtual ​teacher, ​using ​website ​content ​and ​hax ​knowledge ​(for ​developers) as context ​answer ​user ​questions. ​under the hood, "store" is used to house anything needed across various sub-components of overhead chat-agent component. this includes global variables and functions. code for store can be viewed here.
chat-agent ​features ​will ​be ​described ​below ​next components they belong to.


  

 


chat agent

chat âbuttonhandles âopening âclosing âcomponent. âbecause âbutton âprimarily âmade â<div></div> âhtml tag, âcss âwas âused âmake âanimate like âa âimprove âend-user usability âunderstanding.


 âcontrol âbarhandles numerous âfunctions, âin âorder: âdownloading âchat âlog, ârestarting session, âtoggling âdata âcollection, âdeveloper mode, âtoggle âmode, visibility â(when âmode).

title: Wynncraft Physical Collection
description: Wynncraft ​is ​a ​Minecraft ​server that creates an MMORPG experience in Minecraft, with a custom texture pack, soundtrack, quests, and more. Unfortunately, due to it being a
text:
wynncraft ​is ​a ​minecraft ​server that creates an mmorpg experience within minecraft, with a custom texture pack, soundtrack, quests, and more. unfortunately, due to it being free-to-play minecraft server, there was never chance for receive standalone physical edition, similar game such as world of warcraft, which released on numerous cds windows & macintosh systems at the time its release. another benefit media lacks is extra "goodies" come in package, guides, maps, more.
the goal this project create what i imagined release collection would look like along it's updates (in case they were thought "expansion packs". includes creating dvd slip covers, cd labels, extras be inserted into each case. following images showcase designs created make life.​
note: âthis âproject âis ânot officially âaffiliated anyway. just fun fan used incentive learn various graphic design techniques softwares gimp (for design), aseprite original sprites recreating existing sprites), libreoffice draw ensuring proper page layout printing.
